com.soa.delegate

Class DelegateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.soa.delegate.DelegateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DelegateException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception for reporting problems encountered by the delegate.
    See Also:
